decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - 1.	The proposed extension would, by reason its position, size, and appearance, represent an incongruous and obtrusive feature, out of character with the existing properties, detrimental to the appearance of the street scene, contrary to Adopted Unitary Development Plan policies ENV-1.1 and H.3.4 and Revised Deposit Policies ENV-B.1.1 and H.6.3 and the Residential Extension Guidelines.

Condition : 2 - 2.	The proposed extension would, by reason of its position, size and appearance, have a significant adverse impact on the outlook of the adjoining neighbours, detrimental to the amenities currently enjoyed by the adjoining neighbours. The proposal is contrary to Adopted Unitary Development Plan policies ENV-1.1 and H.3.4 and Revised Deposit Policies ENV-B.1.1 and H.6.3 and the Residential Extension Guidelines.
description: DEMOLITION OF EXISTING BATHROOM AND ERECTION OF A TWO STOREY SIDE EXTENSION AND SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION TO DWELLINGHOUSE.
